about_the_game: Play the Steam Smugglers Demo as a Prologue. By briefly introducing the world in which is based and the Fierce Falcon company, experience the first day of work of a train operator. Put yourself in the driver's seat and explore the fantastic locomotive of a train suspended in the air. Find the pieces and get the engine on to start the adventure at full steam!
detailed_description: Play the Steam Smugglers Demo as a Prologue. By briefly introducing the world in which is based and the Fierce Falcon company, experience the first day of work of a train operator. Put yourself in the driver's seat and explore the fantastic locomotive of a train suspended in the air. Find the pieces and get the engine on to start the adventure at full steam!

fullgame.name: Gotta Get Going: Steam Smugglers VR

legal_notice: Copyright © 2018 Black Alligator SL, All rights reserved.
name: Gotta Get Going: Steam Smugglers Prologue Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070/AMD RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

esrb.descriptors: Use of Tobacco, Alcohol Reference, Fantasy Violence

short_description: Put yourself in the driver's seat and explore the fantastic locomotive of a train suspended in the air. Find the pieces and get the engine on to start the adventure at full steam!
